discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: CI green, this is backward compatible.

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Sorry, this was probably needed due to a bug in a previous version of the upstream PR, but this seems to be no longer needed, closing.

commits.author: proux01
commits.message:
Remove coercion Leaf_of_nat in ssrAC

When removing the uniform inheritance condition for coercions in Coq,
this enabled coercions Leaf_of_nat \o nat_of_bool which completely
broke ssrAC.
